name: man pushing boulder
description:
Made over two days for Payload Studio's Tentacle Jam May 18th - 19th 2019.
Theme: No upgrades, only downgrades.

Play as Sisyphus, the man doomed to eternally push a boulder up a hill.
Mash the space bar to push, avoid obstacles, and try not to roll too far behind.

Developed by:
John - Programming
Vikas Valand - Programming
Kush - Level Design
Sam Wong  - Art/Animation
Dave Allen - Music
